dataConnectSections.title: Fully Customizable Dashboard
dataConnectSections.description: Easily hide and re-arrange the widgets to always have the perfect view of your network.

features.title: App Store
features.subtitle: Install additional widgets from the App Store or with Docker

features.title: Kiosk Mode
features.subtitle: Use Kiosk mode to display a custom dashboard on your wall

features.title: Network Monitoring
features.subtitle: See at all time what is happening on your network

dataConnectSections.title: High Performance Traffic Shaping
dataConnectSections.description: Thanks to CAKE and the Linux Kernel, you can shape your traffic with the highest possible performance

features.title: Linux Kernel
features.subtitle: Higher Performance then BSD based solutions with more compatibility

features.title: No more bufferbloat
features.subtitle: CAKE is the only solution that can shape traffic with zero latency added under high load

features.title: Gaming Performance
features.subtitle: Stop jitter and lag during gaming sessions, CAKE is the only bullet proof solution

dataConnectSections.title: No more Ads
dataConnectSections.description: Thanks to Pi-Hole we block all ads at the DNS level.  Easily manage your DNS from our dashboard.

features.title: Built in Management
features.subtitle: Pi-Hole Admin is accessible however you don't even need to leave our dashboard

features.title: Cooperative Naming
features.subtitle: Using DNS and DHCP data we can name and trace clients on your network

dataConnectSections.title: Easy NAS Storage
dataConnectSections.description: Easily manage your NAS storage with our built in Samba server.  Share files between your devices and work together on the same documents.

features.title: Add additional storage
features.subtitle: Leverage ZFS and RAID to add additional storage to your network

features.title: Easy Management
features.subtitle: Easily add shares, users, and groups to your Samba server

dataConnect.title: Connect all of your precious data
dataConnect.description: No more splitting data on Dropbox, Google Drive, or hard drives. Keep your data both updated and safe. Easily sync between devices and manage backups.

features.title: Multi-device
features.subtitle: access via phone, TV or VR

carousel.title: DHCP Leases
carousel.description: View and manage active DHCP leases on your network

carousel.title: Bandwidth Statistics
carousel.description: Monitor network bandwidth usage and trends

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are some frequently asked questions we have answered quickly for you.

items.question: What is DarkFlows?
items.answer: On a Mission to make the best router OS for the home we decided to create the solution to solve our own problems.  We wanted to create a router OS that was easy to use, had all the features we needed, and ultimately solve all our traffic shaping needs.

items.question: Is DarkFlows free to use?
items.answer: DarkFlows is free to use and our intent is to keep it that way.

items.question: Why is CAKE better then solutions on pfSense and OPNsense?
items.answer: CAKE was made to fix all network bufferbloat issues that plague other solutions.  It is the only solution that can shape traffic with zero latency added under high load.

items.question: How can I install DarkFlows?
items.answer: There are two ways to install DarkFlows.  You can use our pre-built ISO images or run our installer script on a Debian based system.

items.question: Why put applications and file sharing on the same system?
items.answer: For most people having one system to rule them all is the best solution.  We have designed DarkFlows to be a very light weight OS that can run on a very inexpensive system and still provide all the features you need.
